name: Absolver Thrull
oracle_text:
Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)
When Absolver Thrull enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, destroy target enchantment.

name: Beastmaster's Magemark
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1.
Whenever a creature you control that's enchanted becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

name: Benediction of Moons
oracle_text:
You gain 1 life for each player.
Haunt (When this spell card is put into a graveyard after resolving, exile it haunting target creature.)
When the creature Benediction of Moons haunts dies, you gain 1 life for each player.

name: Blind Hunter
oracle_text:
Flying
Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)
When Blind Hunter enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

name: Bloodscale Prowler
oracle_text: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: It tracks its victims by the scent of their breath, preferring to dine on those who recently ate well.

name: Burning-Tree Bloodscale
oracle_text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
{2}{R}: Target creature can't block Burning-Tree Bloodscale this turn.
{2}{G}: Target creature blocks Burning-Tree Bloodscale this turn if able.

name: Castigate
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.
flavor_text:
"We have no need for military might. We wield two of the sharpest swords ever forged: Faith in our left hand, Wealth in our right."
—Vuliev of the Ghost Council

name: Cremate
oracle_text:
Exile target card from a graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Cremation of the dead is not a religious ritual in Ravnica. It's a business designed to keep the Golgari from growing in numbers.

name: Cry of Contrition
oracle_text:
Target player discards a card.
Haunt (When this spell card is put into a graveyard after resolving, exile it haunting target creature.)
When the creature Cry of Contrition haunts dies, target player discards a card.

name: Crystal Seer
oracle_text:
When Crystal Seer enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
{4}{U}: Return Crystal Seer to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "Surprise is a useless, untidy emotion—the plaything of goblins and fools."

name: Douse in Gloom
oracle_text: Douse in Gloom deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Orzhov prisoners are steeped in a blackened brew that robs their souls of strength. Patriarchs drink that brew to extend their own lives.

name: Fencer's Magemark
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1 and have first strike.
flavor_text:
"The first blow is the most important. It often negates the need for a second."
—Agrus Kos

name: Ghor-Clan Savage
oracle_text: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor_text: The snap of sinew. The crunch of bone. A cry for mercy. These are the music of the Gruul.

name: Ghost Warden
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I thought of fate as an iron lattice, intricate but rigidly unchangeable. That was until some force bent fate's bars to spare my life."
—Ilromov, traveling storyteller

name: Gigadrowse
oracle_text:
Replicate {U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
Tap target permanent.

name: Gruul Nodorog
oracle_text: {R}: Gruul Nodorog gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text:
Petting the nodorog
—Gruul expression meaning "making a really big mistake"

name: Gruul Scrapper
oracle_text: When Gruul Scrapper enters the battlefield, if {R} was spent to cast it, it gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Gruul aren't satisfied with just smashing things. They continue smashing other things with the things they just smashed.

name: Gruul Signet
flavor_text: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

name: Gruul Turf
oracle_text:
Gruul Turf enters the battlefield tapped.
When Gruul Turf enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {R}{G}.

name: Guardian's Magemark
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1.
flavor_text: The soldier moved with fluid poise, his awareness extending far beyond five senses.

name: Infiltrator's Magemark
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with defender.
flavor_text:
"In secrecy is strength. None can oppose one who cannot be found."
—Szadek

name: Izzet Boilerworks
oracle_text:
Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped.
When Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {U}{R}.

name: Izzet Chronarch
oracle_text: When Izzet Chronarch enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: He ensures not only whether but also when and where the lightning strikes twice.

name: Izzet Signet
flavor_text: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

name: Leap of Flame
oracle_text:
Replicate {U}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains flying and first strike until end of turn.

name: Lionheart Maverick
oracle_text:
Vigilance
{4}{W}: Lionheart Maverick gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Your signet is no symbol of power. It marks only your need for numbers to aid you. What do you do, guild-rat, now that you face my blade alone?"

name: Mourning Thrull
oracle_text:
({W/B} can be paid with either {W} or {B}.)
Flying
Whenever Mourning Thrull deals damage, you gain that much life.
flavor_text: During their ascent to spirithood, patriarchs of Orzhova shed both flesh and emotion. This earthly slag is collected and formed into thrulls.

name: Necromancer's Magemark
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1.
If a creature you control that's enchanted would die, return it to its owner's hand instead.

name: Ogre Savant
oracle_text: When Ogre Savant enters the battlefield, if {U} was spent to cast it, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: He's an oxymoron.

name: Orzhov Basilica
oracle_text:
Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield tapped.
When Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {W}{B}.

name: Orzhov Euthanist
oracle_text:
Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)
When Orzhov Euthanist enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

name: Orzhov Signet
flavor_text: The form of the sigil is just as important as the sigil itself. If it's carried on a medallion, its bearer is a master. If it's tattooed on the body, its bearer is a slave.

name: Ostiary Thrull
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: Orzhov churches don't pass the plate for collection. They charge for admission.

name: Petrahydrox
oracle_text:
({U/R} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.)
When Petrahydrox becomes the target of a spell or ability, return Petrahydrox to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: It departs through the streets' fissures with a sound like gravel pouring into a pond.

name: Pillory of the Sleepless
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life."
flavor_text: Which is worse—the sleep which never ends or that which never comes?

name: Poisonbelly Ogre
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, its controller loses 1 life.
flavor_text: Some claim it's a failed Simic experiment, others say a Golgari creation. Both guilds deny all responsibility, while secretly studying its strange virulence.

name: Pyromatics
oracle_text:
Replicate {1}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
Pyromatics deals 1 damage to any target.

name: Repeal
oracle_text:
Return target nonland permanent with mana value X to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be."
—Agosto, Azorius imperator

name: Restless Bones
oracle_text:
{3}{B}, {T}: Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Restless Bones.
flavor_text:
"We mourn our dead. We shroud our dead. We bury our dead. Too often, it seems, we must kill our dead again."
—Grazda, veteran armorer

name: Runeboggle
oracle_text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Ever try to count hyperactive schoolchildren while someone shouts random numbers in your ear? It's like that."
—Geetra, frustrated mage

name: Scab-Clan Mauler
oracle_text:
Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Trample
flavor_text: They inflict pain to forget their own and break foes to feel whole.

name: Shrieking Grotesque
oracle_text:
Flying
When Shrieking Grotesque enters the battlefield, if {B} was spent to cast it, target player discards a card.
flavor_text: Orzhov mage-sculptors bring their stone to life before they carve it. The shrieking begins as soon as the mouths are formed.

name: Silhana Ledgewalker
oracle_text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Silhana Ledgewalker can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
flavor_text: Street folk call them "spire mice," but behind the mockery is an unspoken envy of the ledgewalkers' skill at avoiding harm.

name: Silhana Starfletcher
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
As Silhana Starfletcher enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.
flavor_text: In light he finds both gift and weapon.

name: Skarrgan Pit-Skulk
oracle_text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Creatures with power less than Skarrgan Pit-Skulk's power can't block it.

name: Skyrider Trainee
oracle_text: Skyrider Trainee has flying as long as it's enchanted.
flavor_text: "Of course I plan on going up. Kang here is the most trusted 'fin on the squad. Afraid? Me? No, I'm just . . . waiting for the right wind conditions."

name: Steamcore Weird
oracle_text: When Steamcore Weird enters the battlefield, if {R} was spent to cast it, it deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Like many Izzet creations, weirds are based on wild contradictions yet somehow manage to work.

name: Streetbreaker Wurm
flavor_text: The Orzhov run a construction unit whose only business is rebuilding the wreckage left in the wake of wurms. When business is slow, they pay Golgari carnomancers to lure the wurms to the surface.

name: Tin Street Hooligan
oracle_text: When Tin Street Hooligan enters the battlefield, if {G} was spent to cast it, destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: "Rauck-Chauv's like a holiday! Only it isn't on the calendars, and instead of dancing you knock people flat, and instead of giving gifts you break stuff."

name: Torch Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}{R}: Torch Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Drakes? Bah! Things that breathe don't interest me. It breathes *fire*, you say? Well, that's a different story!"
—Zataz, Izzet clockwork artificer

name: Train of Thought
oracle_text:
Replicate {1}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "But then . . . oh, but . . . which means . . . which would lead to . . . exactly!"

name: Wee Dragonauts
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Wee Dragonauts gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The blazekite is a simple concept, really—just a vehicular application of dragscoop ionics and electropropulsion magnetronics."
—Juzba, Izzet tinker

name: Wild Cantor
oracle_text:
({R/G} can be paid with either {R} or {G}.)
Sacrifice Wild Cantor: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: They are the voice of the wild, crying out with nature's fury and bringing forth its primeval might.

name: Wildsize
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Two times the size, four times the smell.

name: Withstand
oracle_text:
Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Defense is as much a part of war as offense, the shield as important a tool as the sword."
—Alovnek, Boros guildmage
